```{r read in data}
merged_county_data = read_csv("./data/merged_county_data.csv") %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  rename(year = year_x)
```

```{r}
selectInput(
  "year_choice", 
  label = h3("Choose year"),
  choices = years, selected = "2012")

renderPrint({ 
  input[["compound_choice"]]
})

renderPrint({ 
  input[["year_choice"]]
})
```
